name: Apocalyptic Vibes
storyline:
The world is in decline, it is rough and cold. Echoes of nuclear winter are still heard. Civilization was at the peak of its development, people conquered the solar system, colonizing its planets and satellites. But several large-scale man-made disasters and global wars in a row plunged the Earth into agony.
Now the remnants of humanity are forced to lead a hard life on scraps of surviving land among the ruins of the old World.

You are a lone wanderer walking through the endless wasteland. Your goal is vague, but your intentions are firm. You decide to challenge the cruel world and go out on a dangerous road.
summary: An immersive retro first-person shooter on GZDoom. You are a lone wanderer walking through the endless wasteland. Your destination is vague... Search the ruins of a dead civilization, get into gunfights, survive in severe post-apocalyptic weather. And find the meaning along the way.
